title: Elon Musk on why 'all energy generation will be solar'
description: Tesla founder Elon Musk has reiterated his support for solar energy, citing the Kardashev Scale to highlight its potential. He explained that a small area in Texas or New Mexico could power the entire U.S. with solar energy, emphasizing the efficiency and feasibility of this renewable resource.
